channel.title: Blocking SYI's
channel.description:
Ok I found a tut saying how to ban SYIers and heres the code I put in my client.java (not my code) [code] public void AntiSpammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { misc.println(playerName+": Illegal username: BANNING USERNAME!"); disconnected = true; writeLog(playerName, "bans"); } }[/code] However when I compile I get [code] client.java:18: class, interface, or enum expected public void AntiSpammer() ^ client.java:39: class, interface, or enum expected disconnected = true; ^ client.java:40: class, interface, or enum expected writeLog(playerName, "bans"); ^ client.java:41: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 4 errors Finished Building Class Files..! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] How can I fix this?
If you know another way to block SYIers please tell.
Other info: 317 Delta Based

item.title: Blocking SYI's
item.dc:creator: @Regedit Regedit
item.description:
@Regedit wrote:

Another way that blocks SYI is allowing only 1 or 2 IP’s per connection. This also stops people from nulling your server. (I believe.)

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking SYI's
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

try this:

if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("SYIpkpker")) { writeLog(playerLastConnect, "ipbans"); disconnected = true; }

this will make the syipkpker go into the ipbans file, and permantly ban them
rememeber, you need an ipbans file in the config folder, if you don’t got one, make one!

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking SYI's
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

That is a horrible way of keeping SYI away, use an Array list to hold your connections so that if they go over a set amount they are banned.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

There’s a tutorial on using an Array list to handler connections.

Read full topic

item.title: Blocking SYI's
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

Ok I found a tut saying how to ban SYIers and heres the code I put in my client.java (not my code)

public void AntiSpammer() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("SYIpkpker") || playerName.contains("syi") || playerName.contains("Syi") || playerName.contains("null") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { misc.println(playerName+": Illegal username: BANNING USERNAME!"); disconnected = true; writeLog(playerName, "bans"); } }
However when I compile I get

client.java:18: class, interface, or enum expected public void AntiSpammer() ^ client.java:39: class, interface, or enum expected disconnected = true; ^ client.java:40: class, interface, or enum expected writeLog(playerName, "bans"); ^ client.java:41: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 4 errors Finished Building Class Files..! Press any key to continue . . .
How can I fix this?

If you know another way to block SYIers please tell.

317
Delta Based
